column5: Dangnabit it was a crispy morning. Arrived in Fergus 5:30 this morning to fish the Grand and it was well,,,   Was a very refreshing fish this morning, but a fish would of been a real nice bonus,but I got to get more practice in. All good.     The ole stogie was smoking away this morning. LOL   And NO, I am not getting the hair cut. I can live with it.LOL   Great seeing you again Brad. Will try and meet up in the fall again.
